EmailTemplate.name: ENG-VDI Campaign Q417.02-VDI Campaign Q417-Principled Tech.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Improve VDI Performance by 37% & Do More With Less
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/Principled-Tech_Study_VMTurbo_performance_0315.pdf?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-hc&utm_content=Bus05]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Maximizing performance is vital to the success of hosted virtual applications. Overtax your resources and users will have a degraded experience and underutilizing those resources will lead to wasting money on unnecessary severs. Turbonomic matches real-time application workload demand to infrastructure supply to continuously assure performance, allowing you to do more with less. A recent analysis by Principled Technologies found that by executing Turbonomic’s recommendations, such as reallocation of memory and vCPU, and migrating mission-critical VMs to more efficiently leverage available storage resources, orders per minute completed by the application in Principled Technologies’ virtual test environment increased by 23.7%. Click below to see what Turbonomic's Autonomic Platform can do for you. <[[http://cdn.turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/Principled-Tech_Study_VMTurbo_performance_0315.pdf?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=eng-hc&utm_content=Bus05]]>
- The Turbonomic Team
